text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

──Eheheh,
I'm glad!
Goodbye!
Oh, Kaho...?
Producer-san!
Welcome back!
Welcome back, Kaho.

Producer-san,
are you heading to the office now?
Yeah.

What about Kaho?
She was talking to someone earlier...

She was an adult woman,
not a friend, right...?
Maybe a friend's mom?
No! She's a lady I don't know!

She seemed lost, so I talked to her,
and she said she was lost, so...!
When I heard her story, I knew the place!
So, I escorted her part of the way!
I see, that's impressive!

Eheheh,
you have to help people in trouble!
It's amazing how firmly that awareness is ingrained...
Thanks to being a hero, perhaps?

Yes! Because protecting
everyone's smiles is what heroes do!

...The production staff probably never imagined
such a positive impact would come from this.
Oh, it's nothing.

It's not easy to volunteer to help people,
so Kaho's amazing for doing it.

Amazing? Me!?
Yay!

By the way,
that person earlier praised me too!
Oh, really? What did they praise you for?

They said I was amazing for being kind
even though I'm in elementary school!

Ah, I see!
Even adults find it hard to be kind to others.

Ehehe...
And they also said, "I thought you were in high school!"

Haha, I also made that mistake at first.
You're quite mature, Kaho.

And they said,
"I can't say this, but don't trust adults who rely on children."
That person seems responsible too...!

Because sometimes you can get involved in incidents,
if you look troubled, I'll tell you where the nearest police box is.

I see...!
Got it!

But since you were brave and amazing today,
how about having two snacks for today's treat?

!?
Two snacks? Is that okay!?

Of course!
It's a reward!

A reward...!
Yay!
